content.description: Stick Clip. Climb the "Edge of Infinity" (V5) boulder problem to the hueco and continue to the chains of "Roses and Thorns"
content.protection: Stick Clip + 3 Bolts + Cold Shut Anchors
content.location: Start to the left of the "Roses and Thorns" crack and climb up to the hueco.

content.description: Stick Clip and climb the "Roses and Thorns" crack boulder problem up to a large hueco. (you can lay down and nap). Continue up two more bolts through crimps and a big move before clipping the anchors. Be cautious of the small run between the 1st and second bolt.
content.protection: Stick Clip + 3 Bolts + Cold Shut Anchors
content.location: Slightly up the hill from the road. Currently the left most bolted route on the "Big" Wall. Climb the "Roses and Thorns" crack boulder problem and continue.

content.description: Stick Clip. Scramble the ledge (or mantle it for all the points). Climb through a few hard moves off the ground to jugs near the first bolt. Pull a powerful crux and get the the massive jug / horn above. Keep it together and aim slightly left to find a interesting anchor clip.
content.protection: Stick Clip + 3 Bolts + Cold Shut Anchors
content.location: Right line that starts on the ledge.

content.description: Stick Clip, Scramble onto the ledge (or mantle it for all the points) and pull the crux off the ground. Gain the jugs and don't mix up your hands to get to the next jug ledge. Clip a bolt and find your way left, clip the chains from what ever position feels comfortable... (there's not many)
content.protection: Stick Clip + 3 Bolts + Cold Shut Anchors
content.location: Left line that starts on the ledge.

content.description: Stick Clip. (Do not start on the ledge) Pull some fun moves to establish the jugs under the small roof. Make a large move to decent holds and clip up. Prepare yourself for the crux and make it to the jug ledge above. Move out and right to a jug and find the anchors.
content.protection: Stick Clip + 3 Bolts + Cold Shut Anchors
content.location: To the right of the ledge that the other routes start on. Close to the road when belaying
